snippet.title: Kirby's Pinball Land DX - Full Color Hack Showcase
snippet.description:
This is a full color "DX" hack by kkzero that adds full color support to Kirby's Pinball Land! This hack adds full Game Boy Color functionality to the game, and is playable even on real hardware through flash carts. 

This game is not dual-mode, so revert to the original version if playing on an original GB. Save files appear to be identical between DX and the original, so just rename the save file if you wish to continue on a model of Game Boy from before the Color.

Note that the patch has received an update, so what you see in the video will not be 100% exactly what you see in the game after patching using the link below.

A link to the patch can be found here:
http://www.romhacking.net/hacks/6079/
